definition: configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)

sentences.english: The another big characteristic that small family bedroom places furniture is to fore-and-aft development.
sentences.chinese: 小戶型居室放置傢俱的另一大特色就是向縱向發展。

sentences.english: Space is vital in the small apartment.
sentences.chinese: 空間對小戶型來說至關重要。

sentences.english: Door model again small, also absolutely cannot lack toilet.
sentences.chinese: 戶型再小，衛生間也是萬萬不能缺少的。

sentences.english: Small family's wall surface should choose lusterless .
sentences.chinese: 小戶型的牆面應選擇啞光的。

sentences.english: But now we have moved to a new apartment, large-sized apartment.
sentences.chinese: 但現在我們搬到了一個新的公寓，大戶型。

sentences.english: More suitable for small Huxing housing use, or no heat.
sentences.chinese: 比較適合小戶型，或無熱源的房屋使用。

sentences.english: Small family farm house CAD construction drawings.
Or can it exist big unit here?
sentences.chinese: 或者這裏可能有大戶型存在麼？

sentences.english: What's more, it can make the customers associate with the product when browsing the house layout drawing.
sentences.chinese: 可以讓衆多購房人在瀏覽戶型圖時聯想到該產品。

sentences.english: The Unit is a large bay window living room, lighting is very good.
sentences.chinese: 本戶型客廳是大飄窗，採光非常好。

definition: building under construction/commercial property/real estate (for sale or rent)
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
unit (of measure)/unit (group of people as a whole)/work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)/CL:個|个[ge4]
developer (of real estate, a commercial product etc)
area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
top floor/the top of a building
parking spot/unloading point/garage place/stand for taxi
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
